title: Axiomatic Change Validation Template (ACVT)
description: Standardized schema for SGS-proposed changes used by GAX to validate against the Axiomatic Constraint Vector Definition (ACVD) during GSEP-C Stages S2, S3, and S6.5.

evolution_id.description: Unique ID corresponding to the TEMM/Evolution run.

resource_impact.description: Projected resource footprint changes for stability check (MPAM).

dependency_map_updates.description: List of external/internal dependencies that are modified or introduced for policy check (PVLM).

security_impact_flags.description: High-level behavioral flags for anomaly detection (ADTM).
